About.title: TEACHING CLINICS
About.subtitle: UNICHRISTUS
About.description: Excellence in education, care, and commitment to the community's health.
About.about: The Unichristus Teaching Clinics represent a model of integration between academic training, healthcare, and social responsibility. In Fortaleza, we are a reference in humanized and technically qualified care, with modern infrastructure and experienced professionals guiding the practical training of students.

ExamResults.title: RESULTS
ExamResults.subtitle: EXAM
ExamResults.description: Unichristus Clinics offers a variety of laboratory and imaging exams for you and your family. We have a team of highly qualified professionals ready to serve you.

clinics.physiotherapyEcological: Teaching Physiotherapy Clinic - Ecological Park Campus

Clinics.title: EXCELLENCE IN
Clinics.subtitle: CLOSE TO
Clinics.description: Modern and equipped clinics, with professionals dedicated to the complete care of your health and your family's.

dentistry.title: Teaching Dentistry Clinic
description: The Unichristus Teaching Dentistry Clinic (CEO) is a modern dental complex where undergraduate and graduate students develop the most current dental techniques guided by experienced professionals, with the mission of treating patients comprehensively, bringing well-being and transforming smiles.
There are 117 dental stations, where more than 2,800 free and affordable treatments are performed monthly in the most diverse specialties.
address: Our central unit is located at: Vereador Paulo Mamede Street, 130 - Cocó, Fortaleza - CE, 60192-350
services: Treatment of Patients with Special Needs

health.title: Teaching Health Clinic
description: At the Unichristus Teaching Health Clinic (CES), students from Nursing, Medicine, Nutrition, and Psychology courses provide supervised care by specialist professors, recognized for their academic and professional excellence. The focus is on comprehensive care, with emphasis on humanization, welcoming, and patient well-being.
CES offers consultations in 13 medical specialties, providing the community with quality health services, ethics, and social commitment.
Two programs of great community relevance stand out among its actions:

• Specialized Care Service (SAE) in STI/AIDS, developed in partnership with the Unified Health System (SUS), offering comprehensive and free follow-up to people living with sexually transmitted infections.
• Gynecological Cancer Prevention Program, aimed at early detection, screening, and monitoring of women at higher risk for lower genital tract neoplasms.
address: Our central unit is located at: Vicente Linhares Street, 308 - Aldeota, Fortaleza - CE, 60135-270
services: DM / HAS / Tb / Leprosy Nursing Consultation

physiotherapy.title: Teaching Physiotherapy Clinic
description: The Unichristus Teaching Physiotherapy Clinic is a space for health care and academic excellence, focused on the promotion and functional rehabilitation of community patients. With modern structure, updated equipment, and humanized care, we offer free physiotherapy services in various specialties.

The treatments are performed by Physiotherapy students, under direct supervision of professors with extensive clinical and academic experience, ensuring quality, safety, and commitment to our patients' well-being.
Our commitment is twofold: to contribute to the practical training of our students and to offer the population ethical, accessible, and evidence-based physiotherapy care.
address: We have two units of the Unichristus Teaching Physiotherapy Clinic
Ecological Park Campus (Vereador Paulo Mamede Street, 130 - Papicu - ZIP: 60190-050)
Parquelândia Campus (Uruguai Street, 11 - Bela Vista - ZIP: 60442-590)

imaging.title: Teaching Health and Imaging Clinic Unichristus (CESIU)
description: The Teaching Health and Imaging Clinic Unichristus (CESIU) is a space that combines health education, excellent care, and quality in diagnostic imaging.
Our space was fully developed so that students from health courses at Unichristus can follow, in real time, care procedures, learning from specialist professionals and focusing on patient care.

Additionally, the environment has state-of-the-art equipment for performing magnetic resonance imaging, computed tomography, ultrasound, and X-ray exams, with the objective of providing the best image quality and reliable diagnoses.
CESIU is strategically located in the heart of the city, with easy access and a modern environment, designed to provide the best experience for you. Here, your health is in the best hands.
address: Our central unit is located at: Vicente Linhares Street, 308 - Aldeota, Fortaleza - CE, 60135-270

psychology.title: Applied Psychology School Service (SEPA)
description: The Applied Psychology School Service (SEPA) is a teaching and practice space where Psychology students at Unichristus develop skills in listening, welcoming, clinical practice, and teamwork, always under the supervision of reference professors in various areas of practice.

With a commitment to social responsibility, SEPA offers free psychological care to the community, benefiting children, adolescents, and adults, and promoting quality of life and mental health of users.

Care modalities include individual psychotherapy, therapeutic groups, psychological assessment, neuropsychological assessment, professional guidance, and psychological emergency care. In addition to offices for clinical care, SEPA has a properly structured and updated test library, which offers a diversified collection of psychological instruments authorized by the Federal Council of Psychology (CFP) also used in assessment practices with the community.
address: SEPA operates Monday to Friday at the following addresses and times:
Campus A: Des. Moreira Avenue, 2120 – Dionísio Torres (8am to 12pm and 2pm to 6pm) - SEPA
Campus B: Vicente Linhares Street, 308 – Aldeota (5pm to 8pm) - CESIU
services: Individual care for children, adolescents, adults, and elderly

laboratory.title: LEAC - Teaching Clinical Analysis Laboratory
description: Since 2016, the Teaching Clinical Analysis Laboratory (LEAC) acts as a strategic partner of the health services of the Teaching Health Clinic (CES) and the Teaching Dentistry Clinic (CEO). With a modern structure aligned with the best quality practices, it offers laboratory services that support diagnosis and patient care, in addition to contributing to the training of highly qualified professionals.
address: Scheduling for collection should be done directly at the clinic where the treatments take place:
Teaching Health and Imaging Clinic Unichristus (CESIU) / Phones: 3306-8932 / 3306-8933 / Address: Vicente Linhares Street, 308 - Aldeota.
